title: Body and Soul
description: "You've miscalculated." he announced in a low voice. "You'll be mine...body and soul!"Not likely! Stacey Trent, courtroom psychologist, was intent on doing her job - helping J.D. O'Bannon, corporate attorney and Texas gentleman, choose a jury for the controversial Chesterfield case. Aggressive, professional, she'd been hired by the family in a delicate matter. A novice in the ways of criminal law J.D. needed all the know-how Stacey could supply. But when J.D.'s consultations turned from methods of jury selection to a testimony of passion, Stacey knew she would have to choose - the freedom she adored or the man she desired.
author: Anna Hudson
